message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
You're starting high, I'm starting low. Let's meet in the middle!
I'm willing to compromise, but not that low. Let's meet in the middle again!
I'm still holding firm, but willing to give you a bit more. Meet me here!
I'm getting closer to your offer, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Let's meet at the 50/50 mark!
